nodes.text: Rep Boy served aboard the New Republic's EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate Hellion's Dare as a pilot of Riot Squadron. Shortly after the Alliance victory over the Battle of Endor, whilst playing the game Who? What? Where? with other New Republic pilots, Rep Boy claimed that he wished to die of heatstroke on the beaches of Alakatha at an old age. However, the pilot was soon killed by the forces of the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing during an attack on the frigate.
